enhanced_rules.name: Test Case Duration Spike
enhanced_rules.explanation: Test case duration increased by more than three standard deviations
enhanced_rules.remediation: Investigate the test case for potential issues causing increased execution time

enhanced_rules.name: High Test Case Duration
enhanced_rules.explanation: Test case duration is more than two standard deviations above the mean
enhanced_rules.remediation: Review the test case for potential optimization opportunities

enhanced_rules.name: Sudden Drop in Test Case Duration
enhanced_rules.explanation: Test case duration decreased by more than three standard deviations
enhanced_rules.remediation: Verify that the test case is still functioning as expected

enhanced_rules.name: Low Test Case Duration
enhanced_rules.explanation: Test case duration is more than two standard deviations below the mean
enhanced_rules.remediation: Ensure that the test case is sufficiently comprehensive
